author: Pamela Muse
text:
An Alliance member is looking for policies, guidelines, etc. for writing staff reports and PowerPoint presentations for the Board/Council (templates). Your help is appreciated!
Pamela Muse
West Regional Director
Alliance for Innovation
pmuse@transformgov.org
www.transformgov.org 
888-468-6450
title: Board/Council Staff Reports & PPT Presentations
